post:
URPad.net is pleased to present our promotion is now available in our new location (Hafnarfjordur, Iceland) for ordering immediately, we have a very exclusive special with VPS servers located in US (Los Angeles & New York City) and Europe (Luxembourg & Iceland & UK). URPad.net is a brand of FTNHosting.net which has been in business for close to 5 years!

Specials below are available in our Los Angeles, CA (US), New York City, NY (US), Maidenhead(UK) or Luxembourg (EU) & Iceland _(NEW location)_ facilities. You may choose your desired location in the order form. Instant setup. 99.9% Uptime Guarantee. We guarantee 30 minute response times via ticketing you will no longer have to wait for Support as we are here 24x7.

> 1024MB Ram
1536MB Burst Ram
40GB HDD
500GB Bandwidth _(Iceland is 50% less bandwidth)_
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4 Address
SolusVM/OpenVZ

All at an unbeatable price of $5.99/Month, Instant Setup!

Order now! https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=117

Guaranteed Lifetime Price Lock -- Price NEVER increases after your order is secured!

Monthly payment is available (you can pay on a month basis with absolutely no contract). However, additional discounts are available if paid quarterly, annually, biannually or triennially which is an option in the order form.

URPad.net understands that you might have questions about the service we offer. This is why we make it easy for you to communicate with us.
